snippet: Phil Mickelson was missing his faithful sidekick on Friday, but was unfazed and stayed in contention to finish the second round two strokes behind leader Rory McIlroy at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City....

headline.main: Stone Wins Sunshine Tour Order of Merit
headline.print_headline: Stone Wins Sunshine Tour Order of Merit

lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson was missing his faithful sidekick on Friday, but was unfazed and stayed in contention to finish the second round two strokes behind leader Rory McIlroy at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City.
